[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@al/common](./common.md) &gt; [AlCabinet](./common.alcabinet.md)

## AlCabinet class

AlCabinet provides a simple, generic interface for caching arbitrary data. It supports optional serialization to localStorage and sessionStorage, where available, but will gracefully fallback to in-memory-cache mode in their absence.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AlCabinet 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [delete(property)](./common.alcabinet.delete.md) |  | Deletes a property in the cabinet (and schedules synchronization) |
|  [destroy()](./common.alcabinet.destroy.md) |  | Destroys the current cabinet, discarding any contents it may have. |
|  [ephemeral(rawName)](./common.alcabinet.ephemeral.md) | <code>static</code> | Instantiates a temporary information cache (uses sessionStorage), deserializing data from the provided name if it exists. |
|  [exists(property)](./common.alcabinet.exists.md) |  | Checks to see if a property is present in the cabinet. |
|  [expired(property)](./common.alcabinet.expired.md) |  | Checks to see if a given property is expired. |
|  [get(property, defaultValue, disableExpiration)](./common.alcabinet.get.md) |  | Retrieves a property from the cabinet. |
|  [local(name)](./common.alcabinet.local.md) | <code>static</code> | Instantiates a local cache (uses no storage or persistence). |
|  [persistent(rawName)](./common.alcabinet.persistent.md) | <code>static</code> | Instantiates a persistent information cache (uses localStorage), deserializing data from the provided name if it exists. |
|  [set(property, value, ttl)](./common.alcabinet.set.md) |  | Sets a property in the cabinet (and schedules synchronization) |
